meanings.definition: A system of higher education offering a wide range of courses and programs.
meanings.sent1: The multiversity in our city provides many different classes for students.
meanings.sent2: The multiversity campus has a diverse selection of academic programs.
meanings.sent3: At the multiversity, you can study everything from art to zoology!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a multiversity of knowledge, each subject a different building.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the multiversity felt like exploring a vast library of learning.

meanings.definition: The concept of diversity and variety within a university setting.
meanings.sent1: The multiversity of ideas on campus leads to interesting discussions.
meanings.sent2: The multiversity of cultures at the university enriches the student experience.
meanings.sent3: In the multiversity of opinions, everyone's voice is heard.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a multiversity of colors, reflecting her vibrant personality.
meanings.sent5: The multiversity of flavors in the cafeteria made choosing lunch a delightful challenge.
